gurmukhi: ਕਰ ਕੋਪ ਮਡਤ || ਪਗ ਦ੍ਵੈ ਨ ਭਜਤ || ਕਰ ਰੋਸ ਲਰਤ || ਗਿਰ ਭੂਮ ਪਰਤ ||੨੩੬||
transliteration: Kar Kop Madat|| Pag Dvai Na Bhajat|| Kr Ros Larat|| Gir Bhoom Parat||236||
translation: Getting infuriated, the warriors do not run for two steps and fighting in anger, they fall on the ground.236.

gurmukhi: ਰਣ ਨਾਦ ਬਜਤ || ਸੁਣ ਮੇਘ ਲਜਤ || ਸਭ ਸਾਜ ਸਜਤ || ਪਗ ਦ੍ਵੈ ਨ ਭਜਤ ||੨੩੭||
transliteration: Ran Naad Bajat|| Soun Megh Lajat|| Sabh Saaj Sajat|| Pag Dvai Na Bhajat||237||
translation: Because of the sound of the musical instruments of the battlefield the clouds are feeling shy and the bedecked warriors are not retracing, even slightly.237.

gurmukhi: ਰਣ ਚੱਕ੍ਰ ਚਲਤ || ਦੁਤਿ ਮਾਨ ਦਲਤ || ਗਿਰ ਮੇਰ ਹਲਤ || ਭਟ ਸ੍ਰੋਣ ਪਲਤ ||੨੩੮||
transliteration: Ran Chakkra Chalat|| Dout(i) Maan Dalat|| Gir Mer Halat|| Bhat Sron Palat||238||
translation: The striking discs are shattering the glory and pride of the warriors; because of the dreadfulness of war, the Sumeru mountain has also trembled and the steam of the blood of the warriors is flowing.238.

gurmukhi: ਰਣ ਰੰਗ ਮਚਤ || ਬਰ ਬੰਬ ਬਜਤ || ਰਣ ਖੰਭ ਗਡਤ || ਅਸਵਾਰ ਮਡਤ ||੨੩੯||
transliteration: Ran Ran Machat|| Bar Banb Bajat|| Tan Khanbh Gadat|| Asvaar Madat||239||
translation: The dreadful war is going on with terrible explosions and the horse-riders are fixing their columns of victory.239.

gurmukhi: ਕਿਰਪਾਨ ਕਿਰਤ || ਕਰ ਕੋਪ ਭਿਰਤ || ਨਹੀ ਫਿਰੈ ਫਿਰਤ || ਅਤਿ ਚਿੱਤ ਚਿਰਤ ||੨੪੦||
transliteration: Kridaan Kirat|| Kar Kop Bhirat|| Nahiphirai Phirat|| At(i) Chitt Chirat||240||
translation: Holding their swords in fury, the warriors are fighting and fighting with the strength of their mind, they are not moving back.240.
The warriors are challenging and shouting; they are striking blows with their swords.241.
The warriors are raising their weapons and exhibitir them; they are revolving and striking them.242.
They are aiming at the target in fury and carrying the weapons, they are giving the relish of their edges the enemies.243.
There are thousands of staunch warriors.244.
The shouting and crying warriors have gathered; they are excited and being chopped they are falling and bowing down.245.
The soldiers are hesitatingly aiming their arrows on their targets.246.
The echoes are being heard and the arrows are being shot.247.
The embellished warriors are thundering and are not running away.248.
